verbs.description: photokina 2018 [V: starting] [ARGM-TMP: on september 25th] camera obsessives will converge on cologne for photokina 2018 the world largest camera show this year has been the the busiest f hasselblad cl ghere cologne leica panasonic canon company paris foxconn fujifilm france gopro reuters vancouver bc canon ina fassbender olympus nikon berlin sony steve sony alpha olympus corporation samsung canon germany us
